songs.title: Infectious
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Woah oh, woah oh, woah oh
You're so infectious, yeah, oh, yeah

[Verse 1]
You're so infectious
Them careless move in silence, oh
And you ain't said a word (A word)
Your lips are filled with violence (Filled with violence)
Oh, your body is such a burn (Such a burn)
Spreadin' round the room like butter
Nah-ne-nah, back down like a reactor
Should've came when I wanted and I could have took cover
Wa-wanted to cover
Now it might be too late
Be, be too late, be, be too late (Oh, oh)
Who would have ever known?
Be, be too late, be, be too late

[Verse 2]
You're so infectious
Oh oh, oh oh, oh, oh woah oh
You're so infectious
Such an epidemic
Oh, one day you was the one
Man, everybody play with interest (Yes)
Cause I'm dead, only thing left to do is mourn
Moment of silence
If I'm dead, the only thing I can do is mourn
Now it's beyond too late (Woah)

[Chorus]
Oh oh, killing them softly
Oh my
You're so infectious
Oh oh, oh oh
From your head to your toes down
You're so infectious
But you're so infectious, baby
But our love's so gracious, baby
Drive the whole world crazy
You're so infectious
Infectious
You're so infectious

[Outro]
You're so infectious
You're so infectious
You're so infectious
